com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster

Interface Clusterer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClusterer, BaseClusterer, DPMeans, KMeans, ThresholdClusterer

    public interface Clusterer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distance(Instance inst1, Instance inst2)
      Calculate the distance of the two instances using the distance measures associated with this clusterer.
      ClusterResult doCluster(DataSet ds)
      Generate clusters given the provided DataSet ds
      ClusterResult doIncrementalCluster(DataSet ds, List<Cluster> clusters)
      Cluster the instances in ds using the clusters provided
      void init()
      Method to initialize the clusterer - useful for clusterers that need to allocated resources such as thread pools
      void terminate()
      Method to terminate the clusterer - useful for clusterers that need to cleanup resources such as thread pools

      • doIncrementalCluster

        ClusterResult doIncrementalCluster(DataSet ds,
                                 List<Cluster> clusters)
        Cluster the instances in ds using the clusters provided
        Parameters:
        ds - is the DataSet containing the new instances to cluster
        clusters - is the list of clusters to use during clustering
        Returns:
        the list of clusters that were modified

      • doCluster

        ClusterResult doCluster(DataSet ds)
        Generate clusters given the provided DataSet ds
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the list of clusters created

        Returns:
